description: Try our easy to follow Deep-Fried Whole Prawns With Lime Chilli Salt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: DeepFried Whole Prawns With Lime Chilli Salt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, grated

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 120Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Remove centre spine from lime leaves and slice. Place into a food processor with ginger, chilli and 1 tbs of salt. Process until finely chopped. Add remaining salt and pulse until just combined. Transfer to baking tray. Bake for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes, until dried. Cool completely before storing in a sealed jar.
Place egg white in a bowl. In a second bowl combine flour, quinoa and 2 tbs of salt mix. Dip prawns into egg white then into flour mixture to coat. Place on a plate.

Heat oil in a wok or saucepan over medium heat. Cook prawns, in batches, for 23 minutes or until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towel and serve with salt and lemon wedges. Note: Small prawns such as these can be eaten whole, shell and all!
